definition: the Peach Blossom Spring, a hidden land of peace and prosperity/utopia
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: On motes light belief meet in the Peach Garden.
sentences.chinese: 依着微尘的灯光信念相逢在桃花源。

sentences.english: Now that he can till fields in the Land of Peach Blooming?
sentences.chinese: 陶令不知何处去，桃花源里可耕田？

sentences.english: This is the beauty of today's paradise village dam.
sentences.chinese: 这就是当今的桃花源村坝美。

sentences.english: Located in the the Peach Garden, beauty beauty, why life is music.
sentences.chinese: 落户于桃花源，美景美人，何尝人生不乐。

definition: Tao Yuanming (c. 365-427), Jin dynasty writer and poet
Taoyuan county in Changde 常德[Chang2 de2], Hunan/Taoyuan township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
water from a mountain/mountains and rivers/scenery/landscape
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom)/fig. enchanting scenery
heaven on Earth/nickname for the city Suzhou
patchwork of waterways, esp. in Jiangsu/same as 江南水鄉|江南水乡[Jiang1 nan2 shui3 xiang1]
mountains on one side and water on the other
